manpage.title: iscsymf

description.para: iscsymf判断参数c是否是字符或下划线。条件满足返回非零，否则返回零。

return.para: 条件满足返回非零， 否则返回零。

manpage.result: a is an English character or UnderLine Character! _ is an English character or UnderLine Character! 1 is not an English character and UnderLine Character! ? is not an English character and UnderLine Character!
